entry.title: Combined summary - Question: Invoice
entry.summary: The email thread discusses various aspects of Lightning Network implementation and usage, including scenarios related to LN usage such as issues with payments getting stuck in limbo and uncertainty about whether a user prefers on-chain payments or LN payments. The thread includes responses from Rusty Russell and Johan Torås Halseth who suggest solutions such as using BOLT 11 QR codes with fallback addresses, adding a lightning parameter to bitcoin URLs for backwards compatibility, and waiting or trying again with a new invoice if a payment fails. The thread also mentions the availability of a translated version of the LN whitepaper in Polish and a strong pro-LN community in Poland. In addition, it discusses the relationship between the decremental time lock on the network and block confirmation time, and the potential solution for unreliable payments. Overall, the thread provides insights into the challenges and solutions related to the use of Lightning Network for payments.
